body_html:
Not entirely sure if it is the same issue, but I'm also receiving a BUILD file not found on package path error.

~$ bazel test //home/Documents/magenta-master/magenta ERROR: no such package 'home/Documents/magenta-master/magenta': BUILD file not found on package path.

Iḿ using Bazel 0.3.1 on Ubuntu 16.04

body:
Not entirely sure if it is the same issue, but I'm also receiving a BUILD file not found on package path error.

`~$ bazel test //home/Documents/magenta-master/magenta
ERROR: no such package 'home/Documents/magenta-master/magenta': BUILD file not found on package path.`

Iḿ using Bazel 0.3.1 on Ubuntu 16.04
